channel.title: How do i make a chat log?!?! pleeasee help :'c
channel.description:
Hey ^.^ I was wondering how to make a chat log, I'm trying to get a report system going, but I obviously need a chat log to proove they broke rules =o
I use marcscape (317) Thanks in advanced!
